text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly states that driving alone after failing the practical test while on a provisional license (which is implied by the context of having just taken the test and needing supervision) means driving 'otherwise than in accordance with a licence,' which confirms the illegality of driving unsupervised with a learner's license in the UK.", "criterion_id": "eb545792-32ff-4d27-b44a-8f37a958dd90"}
